Package org.cesecore.internal

Class CommonCacheBase<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cesecore.internal.CommonCacheBase<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommonCache<T>
    public abstract class CommonCacheBase<T>
extends Object
implements CommonCache<T>
    Object and name to id lookup cache base implementation. Note that this type of cache is not optimized for short-lived objects, but will prevent memory leaks to some extent through checking for stale data during updates.
    Version:
    $Id: CommonCacheBase.java 28332 2018-02-20 14:40:52Z anatom $

      • getMaxCacheLifeTime

        protected abstract long getMaxCacheLifeTime()
        Returns:
        the maximum allowed time an object may reside in the cache before it is purged. 0 means live forever.

      • willUpdate

        public boolean willUpdate​(int id,
                          int digest)
        Description copied from interface: CommonCache
        this method exposes the loginc inside updateWith that determines if an object is the same as the cached object. If the objects are the same, updateWith will not update the object as an optimization. This method can be used to skip expensive object creation if the objects are anyway the same and updateWith will not end up doing anything
        Specified by:
        willUpdate in interface CommonCache<T>
        Parameters:
        id - id of the object, typically database id
        digest - typically getProtectString(0).hashCode() of the object;
        Returns:
        true if a call to updateWith will perform an actual cache update

      • updateWith

        public void updateWith​(int id,
                       int digest,
                       String name,
                       T object)
        Description copied from interface: CommonCache
        Update the cache with the current version read from the database.
        Specified by:
        updateWith in interface CommonCache<T>
        Parameters:
        id - id of the object, typically database id
        digest - typically getProtectString(0).hashCode() of the object;
        name - String name of the object, typically database name
        object - the object to cache
